StandardsControl.description: An individual StandardsControl within the Standard.

properties.name: Reason
properties.description: the reason the standard control is disabled

properties.name: StandardsControlArn
properties.description: the Arn for the standard control.

resource.description: The AWS::SecurityHub::Standard resource represents the implementation of an individual AWS Security Hub Standard in your account. It requires you have SecurityHub enabled before you can enable the Standard.

properties.name: DisabledStandardsControls
properties.description: StandardsControls to disable from this Standard.

type.description: StandardsControls to disable from this Standard.

properties.name: StandardsArn
properties.description: The ARN of the Standard being enabled

type.description: The ARN of the Standard being enabled

attributes.description: The AWS::SecurityHub::Standard resource represents the implementation of an individual AWS Security Hub Standard in your account. It requires you have SecurityHub enabled before you can enable the Standard.

properties.name: StandardsSubscriptionArn
properties.description: The ARN of the StandardsSubscription for the account ID, region, and Standard.

type.description: The ARN of the StandardsSubscription for the account ID, region, and Standard.
